service.unavailable: Service unavailable at this moment. Please try again later.
service.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

content.unavailable: Could not load the content at this time. Please try again in a while.
content.itemDetailUnavailable: Could not find details for this {item}
content.loadMoreError: Failed to load more items. Please try again later.

contacts.accessRequestDesc: We require your contacts' access to suggest Shia people in your phonebook to invite to this app.

bookDetails.title: {title} â€” Find more free books like this on Bazm

tools.name: Tools
tools.salatAlarmDesc: Set alarms for Azaan as per your local times
tools.sehriAlarmDesc: Set Alarm for Sehri, or even get a wake-up call on your number before Sehri!
tools.sehriAlarmOptionDisabled: Alarms for Sheri time during the month of Ramadan (available only during Ramadan)
tools.tasbeehCounterDesc: Recite Duas, Quran and Tasbeeh on repeat mode easily with Audio Tasbeeh counter
tools.qnaDesc: Search and Ask questions or find answers to masle-masayel from your daily life on matters of Islam.

alarms.settingsTip: Change Location and preferences in Alarm settings. Click Settings icon to start.
minToImsakDesc: Alarm rings {min} minutes before end of Sehri time
Alarm rings {hour} hour before end of Sehri time
alarms.notRamadan: Looks like it's not Ramadan yet. Please come back during or just before the Ramadan to set the Alarms for Sehri

push.heading: Notification access required
push.desc_request: The alarm works by sending push notifications at designated times. Without access to push, app will not work in expected way. Kindly allow access to your push notification so that we can inform you at alarm times.
push.desc_denied:
You denied notification access earlier. It is required for push-notifications to work properly. We send notifications at alarm time.
Kindly allow access to push notifications by clicking the button.
push.toast_granted: Thank you! You will get notified at alarm times now.
push.toast_denied: Notification request denied. Please allow the access for app to work properly.
push.toast_prompt: You need to allow notification access to set alarms.

alarmSetting.title: Alarm Settings
alarmSetting.timesPeekDesc: You can disable display of quick view of times for Salat here:

user.name: User | Account
user.shareUpdateToFeed: Also share this update to my feed
user.statusText_ph: Use _italics_ or *bold* formatting to decorate your status

unauthAccess.heading: Are you sure you're at the right place?
unauthAccess.desc:
It looks like you were trying to access a page for which you didn't have permission. If you were trying to access a page you've accessed previously, try to login; that should solve the problem.

Please feel free to contact us if the problem persists.

guest.heading: Why Login or Register?
guest.desc: With an account on our app, you can use a number of features. Get started by creating an account, if you don't have an account already. Or, just login!

engage.heading: Engage on app
engage.desc: Engage with other users, react to their posts or requests, comment your opinion, bookmark your items, and so much more!

fatiha.heading: Post Fatiha Request
fatiha.desc: Post request for Surah-e-Fatiha for the souls of your departed loved ones and get their souls blessed with prayers of all our users!

askQues.heading: Ask Questions
askQues.desc: Ask questions from Deen & Duniya on various topics to be answered by his eminence, Ayatullah Al-Sayyid Ali Al-Husseini Al-Sistani!

content.heading: preferred content
content.desc: Always see your preferred content and settings when you're logged in into your account. Also, get notified for all the interesting things!

personalized.heading: personalized sharing
personalized.desc: Set sharing content personalized with your signature so that your friends know when you share a message/post.

posts.title: Posts
posts.userNoPosts: When you change your picture/cover image, or when you request for surah-fatiha for your demised loved ones, these posts will appear here and in Home tab (of others too). Try adding a picture or cover image?

header.marhumeenNotAdded: {name} hasn't marhumeen added yet | You haven't added marhumeen yet
header.marhumeenAdded: {name} has added following marhumeen | You have added following marhumeen

errors.locUnavailable: Location unavailable. Please set it by clicking the icon to see quick-view of Salat-times.
errors.unknownError: An error occurred. Could not load times at this moment.

createPost.heading: What's today about?
createPost.desc: Click here to share an update or use an option from below

dedication.placeholder: Who do you want to gift this to?
dedication.addPeopleToggle: Let others be a part of this sawab too!
dedication.searchInput: Invite momimeen from Bazm or your Contact list
dedication.minUsersHeader: Want to set minimum number that participants need to choose?

modal.postTime: When is it? | When do you want to start streaming?
modal.previewDes: This is how your post would appear in feed of other people. People can tap on the video to see it in full screen.

comments.name: Comments
comments.loadPrevious: Load previous comments | Load previous replies
comments.noComments: No comments on this post yet
comments.requestToLogin: Login or Signup to start discussion

title.addUpdate: Update loved one | Add loved one

addEditRel.heading: Add a loved-one who has passed on | Select a loved one from the list or add a loved-one who has passed on
addEditRel.subheader: Add details of your loved one | You can also include a message in your request

form.relation: Your relationship with her | Your relationship with him
form.demiseText: We're very sorry to hear about your loss. May Allah give you and your family the strength to bear this loss with patience and may Allah reward the demised soul with highest places in Jannah. Choosing this option enables you to ask momineen for Namaz-e-Wahshat for the demised soul.

addEditRel.addMsg_ph:
Example:
 Inna lillahi wa inna ilaihe raje'un. Please recite a surah-e-fatiha and 2-rak'at namaz-e-wahshat for my uncle, Syed Zeeshan Haider wald Syed Tauqeer Hasan Marhoom, who left us all crying behind to meet his creator.
addEditRel.infoEditRelative: You can edit details for {name} in your Account > Souls section

form.quesLabel_ph: Search for a question or ask your own
form.similarQues: These questions may already have the answer you're looking for.
form.askAnonInfo: Your name will not be sent to the Scholar when requesting an answer on your behalf, neither will it be display across our app with this question. But anonymous questions may not be answered quickly.
form.askSistaniInfo: You can ask a question to be answered by the office of his eminence, Ayatullah Al-Sayyid Ali Al-Husseini Al-Sistani. We will forward the question to their website (along with your profile information). Make sure you've read the Terms & Conditions properly.
form.sistaniOrgTncInfo: Consider following points from their website before you ask a question, because if you do not adhere to below points, you may not hear back from them, or may not receive any answers.

authPrompt.title: Account required
authPrompt.infoText: This feature requires you to login or register before you could use it. Click Login if you are already registered, or click Sign up to create your account.

location.title: Change Location
location.autoDetectInfo: Enter your location or click the auto-detect icon to get your location.

reqAccess.heading: access required
reqAccess.subheading: We need permission to access your camera
reqAccess.subtext: Please allow the access by clicking the button below:

shareBtn.subtext: Click one of the options below to share this on respective app:
shareBtn.copyText: Clicked {icon} icon to copy below content:

page1.infoText1: We need your mobile number to verify your identity. You may also get occasional updates.
page1.infoText2: Enter your number and click the button to get your confirmation code: | Enter your number and click a button to get your confirmation code:

page2.header: We've sent a 6-digit confirmation code to your number ({number})

userSettings.publishToFeed: Publish my changes to feed too.

sign.sharingDesc: When sharing externally, your messages may look like below:
sharingTextDemo: Listen to this Nauha on Bazm App
{name} recommends listening to this Nauha on Bazm App
sign.addSignDesc: Want to add your signature too?
sign.signDesc: When you share your wish with friends on this app, your signature will be added to the messages. For example, it might appear as below:

changeLang.desc: Choose the language in which you would like to see the app content. Click on a language and wait (it takes sometime to load the translation) to see how this phrase appears in selected language.

forgotPwd.title: Forgot password?
forgotPwd.introText: Resetting your password is easy. Select a method to continue:
forgotPwd.sendEmailIntro: Enter the email address that you created your account with, and we'll send an email with link to setup a new password for your account.
forgotPwd.sentEmailText: If you have an account with us, you will get a password-reset email shortly on {email}. Kindly check your email for the link.
forgotPwd.phoneIntroText: Enter the phone-number added to your account. We'll send an OTP to verify your ownership, and in the next step, you will be able to create a new password.
forgotPwd.disclaimerText: Please note that you'll get an {item} only if you have the {item} registered with us

resetPwd.title: Reset Password
resetPwd.introText: Set a secure password for your account here. Click {icon} to ensure that you're entering the right password.

authPage.msgForAuthUser:
We think you landed here by mistake, as you are already logged in.

You can check your profile to see how it looks, or use one of the links below to browse other sections:

card.heading: Install Bazm { platform }
card.desc: Download Android app for a better experience, personalized content, notifications and everything of your interest from around you! | Install app shortcut (bookmark) to access it directly from your homescreen next time for a better experience! It barely takes any space on your device but helps you get back on the app quickly.

webFeedback.heading: How is your experience so far?
webFeedback.text:
Do you like the new app? Is there something we can improve? Please help us with your feedback to improve the experience for you!

This would take only a few minutes, and we highly appreciate your time!

advertise.heading: Advertise on Bazm
advertise.text:
Reach millions of Shia muslims around the world with your product on Bazm or engage with brands and users.

Start for as low as $1/day!

upgradeSafari.description:
This browser (Safari) is not optimised for the best experience. By continuing to use our app here, you will miss out on a number of features such alert notifications, near by updates, offline mode and so much more.
We recommend you to get one of below listed browsers for an improved experience. Click any of the buttons to download the browser from AppStore:

cookieBanner.firstPara: We do not store any cookies on your {device} but third party apps used in our app might (such as, Google Analytics). We instead use permanent storage to store any important data, and in most cases, this is encrypted in storage and during tranfer.
cookieBanner.secondPara: By continuing to use this app, you hereby confirm that you don't have any issues with our choices. To find out more about our cookies and data use, see our Privacy Policy.

meta.titleBranding: __ Bazm - Social Network App for Shia muslims around the world! Download the app today.

home.title: Bazm - Online Shia community app!
home.description: Bazm app is the Shia community app that meets all your daily needs of deen & mazhab. Find Nauhe, Majalis, Dua, Aamaal, Ziyarat, Books, etc. for all dates and occasions. Watch and do live-stream events and majalis with Shia-muslims around the world from the convenience of your home. Join today!

feed.title: Find tailored content and share with shia community around you and the world
feed.description: Find and share news, events, and content with shia momineen around, and keep them informed about any events you're hosting. Learn about anything happening near you on the app.

mediaHome.title: Bazm - Nauhe, Majalis, Dua, Ziyarat, Aamaal and so much more for you!
mediaHome.description: Find Nauhe, Majalis, Dua, Aamaal, ziyarat and so much more for all dates and occasion. Watch and do live-stream majalis from the convenience of your home! Join the Shia social network app that helps you with routine tasks of deen & mazhab. Join today!

toolsHome.title: Bazm - Daily Azaan alarm, question-answer and tools for Shia muslims
toolsHome.description: Get daily reminder for Adhan, find & ask question-answer on topics of deen & islam, or request Surah-fatiha or Namaz-e-Wahshat for your marhumeen, and more tools on Bazm. Join the Shia social network app that helps you with routine tasks of deen. Find Nohe/Nauhe, Majalis, Dua, Aamaal, Ziyarat for all dates and occasions. Live-stream events and majalis from the convenience of your home. Join today!

tasbeehCounter.title: Automatic tasbeeh counter with Voice __ Tasbeeh Counter tool
tasbeehCounter.description: Reciting countless tasbeeh is now easier with our Audio tasbeeh counters. Recite your tasbeeh while you're driving or working, still keeping track of the count with voice counters. Get this tool and others like it on Bazm app. Download today.

accountHome.title: Bazm - Create your free account today and get help with your daily needs of deen!
accountHome.description: Join the Bazm app today to meet all your needs to deeniyat. Find nohe/nauhe, majalis, dua, ziyarat, aamaal for all dates and occasions. Live-stream and watch majalis & events from around you; find posts, content and momineen from around you and the world, and so much more on the app. Join today!

nauheListPage.title: Listen to Nauhe from popular nauhakhwan around the world
nauheListPage.description: Listen to nauhe from all years and all popular nauhakhwan from around the world on Bazm app. Download today.

soazListPage.title: Listen to Soaz from popular Soazkhwan around the world
soazListPage.description: Listen to Soaz from all years and all popular Soazkhwan from around the world on Bazm app. Download today.

majalisList.title: {type} majalis/majlis on Bazm - Find more nauhe, audio/video majalis, dua, ziyarat, aamaal, etc. on Bazm
majalisList.description: Find audio/video majalis from Maulana and Zakir-e-Ahlbayt from near you and around the world. Listen to and watch latest majalis and livestream sessions on Bazm app. Download the app today and join millions of Shi'a muslims around the world!

title: Duas and aamaal for the month of {month} on Bazm - Find more nauhe, audio/video majalis, dua, ziyarat, aamaal, etc. on Bazm
Duas and aamaal for all months on Bazm - Find more nauhe, audio/video majalis, dua, ziyarat, aamaal, etc. on Bazm
duasPage.description: Find duas, aamaal, ziyarat and munajat for all months on Bazm, date and event wise. Download the app today and join millions of Shi'a muslims around the world!
